Title: Godzilla: Planet of the Monsters
Writer: Gen Urobuchi (original story), Gen Urobuchi (screenplay), Gen Urobuchi (series composition), Sadayuki Murai (series composition), Yusuke Kozaki (series composition)
Actors: Mamoru Miyano, Takahiro Sakurai, Kana Hanazawa, Tomokazu Sugita
Plot: A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over, but one young man wants revenge above all else.
